name: Quake IV
notes:
Run the game at least once using Wine to generate the CD key then copy the key in q4base/quake4key to ~/.quake4/q4base/
If you experience audio lag, set padsp as the command prefix in the system options.
content:
exe: quake4
files:
- binaries: https://lutris.net/files/games/quake-4/quake4-linux-1.4.2.x86.run
- steam-data: $WINESTEAM:2210:q4base
installer:
- merge:
    dst: $GAMEDIR/q4base
    src: steam-data
- chmodx: binaries
- execute:
    args: -- -i $GAMEDIR -b $GAMEDIR
    file: binaries
    terminal: true
